Correct Solution.question: A packet of biscuits weighs 0.45 \ kg. What is the total weight of 6 such packets?
A library in Singapore has 6,250,430 books. If 2,317,549 books are borrowed, how many books are left in the library?
Siti has 3 whole pizzas. She wants to share them equally among 5 friends. What fraction of a pizza will each friend get?
Mrs Lim baked 2 and \( \frac{1}{4} \) trays of cookies. She divided the cookies equally among her 3 children. How much of a tray of cookies did each child get?
Mei Ling bought 2.5 \text{ kg} of flour and used 1.75 \text{ kg} to bake cookies. How much flour does she have left?
A shirt usually costs \$48. During a sale, the price of the shirt is reduced by 25\%. What is the sale price of the shirt?
A bicycle covers a distance of 30 kilometres in 2 hours. What is the average speed of the bicycle in kilometres per hour?
The ratio of the number of apples to the number of oranges in a fruit basket is 3 : 5. If there are 18 apples, how many oranges are there in the basket?
Tom has 3m + 8 marbles. He gives away 5 marbles to his friend and now has 20 marbles left. What is the value of m?
